name: Max Rebo (V)
Lore: 'Ortolan musician and gambler. Leader of The Max Rebo Band. Signed a lifetime contract to Jabba in exchange for unlimited food.',
Text: 'If just lost (even from Life Force), opponent ''steals'' Max into Lost Pile. While at a battleground site: you may play Bith Shuffle or Ommni Box to cancel a Force drain at a related location, they are Lost Interrupts, and once per turn may take one of them into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
